PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Log file" tooltip="Enables event logging. The parameter enables the user to append certain parts of the installp command output to the log file specified by this parameter. By default the output of the installp command goes to stdout and stderr, unless SMIT or VSM is used, in which case the output goes to the smit.log. If you use this parameter, it must specify an existing, writable file, and the file system in which the file resides must have enough space to store the log. The log file does not wrap. Uses the option "-e" at command line, if parameter not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Log file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Enables event logging. The parameter enables the user to append certain parts of the installp command output to the log file specified by this parameter. By default the output of the installp command goes to stdout and
stderr, unless SMIT or VSM is used, in which case the output goes to the smit.log. If you use this parameter, it must specify an existing, writable file, and the file system in which the file resides must have enough space to store
the log. The log file does not wrap. Uses the option "-e" at command line, if parameter not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Prevent performing bosboot" tooltip="Prevents the system from performing a bosboot in the event that one is needed. Uses the option "-b" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Prevent performing bosboot</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Prevents the system from performing a bosboot in the event that one is needed.
Uses the option "-b" at command line, if parameter set to 'yes'.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="1" text="Sudo password" tooltip="Sudo password." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Sudo password</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">1</entry><entry name="tooltip">Sudo password.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_LOG_FILE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_LOG_FILEs.00><UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOT#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_PREVENT_BOSBOOTs.00><UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
